text: The Unforgettable Year 1919 () is a 1952 Soviet drama movie directed by Mikheil Chiaureli.Незабываемый 1919 год (1951)Незабываемый 1919 год (1951) It stars Boris Andreyev, Mikheil Gelovani, and Pavel Molchanov. ==Actors== *Boris Andreyev as Shibaev *Mikheil Gelovani as Joseph Stalin *Pavel Molchanov as Vladimir Lenin *Gavriil Belov as Mikhail Kalinin *Boris Olenin as Grigory Zinoviev *Nikolai Komissarov as General Neklyudov *Vladimir Kenigson as Paul Dukes == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian drama movies Category:Russian biographical movies Category:1952 drama movies Category:1950s biographical movies Category:1950s historical movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Mikheil Chiaureli Category:Movies set in the 1910s
title: The Unforgettable Year 1919
